Title: Black Thursday
Writer: Roger Boussinot (based on the story by), Albert Cossery (adaptation), Michel Mitrani (adaptation)
Actors: Christian Rist, Christine Pascal, Judith Magre, Henri Garcin
Plot: Paris, July 1942. Paul, an idealist student, is warned of a vast roundup of Jews (the one that will remain under the name of "Vel d'Hiv"). In the hope of saving a few people, he wanders all...
